author: mariadalfonso
body:
preparation for nanoV9 post reminiUL

* add new modifier nanoAOD_106Xv2
* add wf for data 136.8523
* cleanup the repetition in using modifier
* those nanoAOD_106Xv1 and nanoAOD_106Xv2 added in the runTheMatrix to run by default in the "please test"

TO DO:
* add MC wf (pending this https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32463#issuecomment-748108721)
title: Update nano modifiers
